== Packages maintained with bzr ==

This page lists the current set of Ubuntu source packages that are maintained with bzr.  If a package is listed here you should not grab it with `apt-get source` but instead follow the instructions at BzrContributorHowto.

Is there any reason to not autogenerate this list from the Vcs-Bzr fields in the packages ? -- JelmerVernooij

If you want to begin maintaining a source in bzr, read through BzrMaintainerHowto.  One of the steps is adding it to the following list.
